name: WaterHope Foundation
about: WaterHope Foundation works on rural water pipeline infrastructure and sanitation projects across Maharashtra.

name: Green Village NGO
about: Green Village NGO focuses on water conservation and village-level rainwater harvesting programs.

name: Urban Sanitation Trust
about: Urban Sanitation Trust specializes in urban water sanitation and sewage management solutions.

name: Rural Health Trust
about: Rural Health Trust provides healthcare access to rural populations, including mobile clinics and telemedicine.

name: LifeCare Foundation
about: LifeCare Foundation focuses on health awareness campaigns and preventive healthcare in villages.

name: Village Medical Aid
about: Village Medical Aid provides emergency medical support and basic health infrastructure in remote areas.

name: EduFuture Society
about: EduFuture Society promotes digital literacy and school infrastructure improvements in rural Karnataka.

name: Bright Schools Initiative
about: Bright Schools Initiative focuses on teacher training and scholarship programs for underprivileged students.

name: Rural Learning Mission
about: Rural Learning Mission improves literacy and vocational training in remote villages.

name: WomenRise Collective
about: WomenRise Collective empowers women through skill development and microfinance programs.

name: EmpowerHer Foundation
about: EmpowerHer Foundation focuses on women's health, education, and entrepreneurship initiatives.

name: SkillUp India
about: SkillUp India offers vocational training and job placement programs for youth.

name: Youth Career Builders
about: Youth Career Builders provides career guidance and entrepreneurship support for rural youth.

name: CleanRiver Initiative
about: CleanRiver Initiative works on river cleaning, water purification, and community awareness projects.

name: HealthBridge East
about: HealthBridge East provides healthcare access, mobile clinics, and health education programs.
